LayoutNode.Content: Highlights Smooth cursor control for precise tracking and easy text selection Made from durable plastic material USB-powered power source
LayoutNode.SRC:
Highlights

Smooth cursor control for precise tracking and easy text selectionMade from durable plastic materialUSB-powered power source

LayoutNode.Content: Logitech® Mouse M100 gives you just the basics for comfortable, reliable control of your computer. It’s built by Logitech®—the mouse experts—and comes with thequality we’ve built into more than a billion mice. There’s no software to install. And since it’s corded, you can just plug the cable into a USB port and use it right away.The full-size, ambidextrous shape means your hand will rest comfortably, while high-definition optical tracking (1000 dpi) means you’ll get responsive, smooth cursorcontrol for precise tracking and easy text selection.
LayoutNode.SRC: Logitech® Mouse M100 gives you just the basics for comfortable, reliable control of your computer. It’s built by Logitech®—the mouse experts—and comes with the quality we’ve built into more than a billion mice. There’s no software to install. And since it’s corded, you can just plug the cable into a USB port and use it right away. The full-size, ambidextrous shape means your hand will rest comfortably, while high-definition optical tracking (1000 dpi) means you’ll get responsive, smooth cursor control for precise tracking and easy text selection.
Material: Plastic

LayoutNode.Content: Do not hurry up and buy!!! (would not recommend) SSPHL53 — 24 days ago verified purchaser Item had exposed wires. The wires got dangerously hot when touched.
